title: The epistle that Iohan Sturmius, a man of great lerninge and iugement, sent to the Cardynalles and prelates that were chosen and appointed by the Bysshop of Rome, to serche out the abuses of the churche. Translated into englysshe by Rychard Morysine.
author: Sturm, Johannes, 1507-1589.
publisher: In aedibus Thomas Bertheleti Regii impressoris. Excus.,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
